name: Richard GOLD and Alice Gold, his wife, Appellants, v. SUMMIT TOWNSHIP, BUTLER COUNTY, Appellee

judges: NEWMAN, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Richard GOLD and Alice Gold, his wife, Appellants, v. SUMMIT TOWNSHIP, BUTLER COUNTY, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The appeal is dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
NEWMAN, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Alexander H. Lindsey, Jr., for Appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
694 A.2d 342
Richard GOLD and Alice Gold, his wife, Appellants, v. SUMMIT TOWNSHIP, BUTLER COUNTY, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted July 12, 1996.
Decided June 19, 1997.
John Lane Geyer, for Appellants.
Alexander H. Lindsey, Jr., for Appellees.
